name: The Edge of Sanity
description:
This game was made for Matoka Tornsey. Shepherd of the Wolf, Hethradiah. Their actions over the course of this medium shall inform the decisions and fates of the wider story to come. 

Take care and consider your movements throughout the Isle. Deathly consequences abound...

--- How to Play ---

Edge of Insanity is an interactive text-based adventure game and a modified companion to our in-person DnD campaign. To the best of my ability, I have made it possible to complete the game using only in-browser prompts. 

Though at times, particularly if one finds themself in a deathly confrontation with some aberration of the abyss. One may need to break out the sacred dice and fight for all that is worthy.
